overview: Welcome to the horniest club in town! Lose those stuffy inhibitions and get down to some nasty ass sex. That's the motto for a certain determined (make that degenerated) group of friends who firmly believe that being a Swinger is where it's at. Just lost yer chick? Well fear not. You'll be grunting and sweating over some hot little vixen in no time! So get on the horn and call them up...Swingers, you won't regret it.
title: Swingers
